name.jp: クリスマス スクロール パッケージ

description.en: A package containing 15 Upcut Stone, 15 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 20 Scroll of Return and a Christmas Costume Select Box. All items are also linked.
description.ar: A package containing 15 Upcut Stone, 15 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 20 Scroll of Return and a Christmas Costume Select Box. All items are also linked.
description.br: Ao abrir este pacote você receberá os seguintes itens: Pedra Mágica (x15), Revigorante X ou Poção Suprema (x15), Pergaminho do Retorno (x20) e Caixa de Vestimenta de Natal (x1). Todos os itens são ligados à alma.
description.cns: A package containing 15 Upcut Stone, 15 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 20 Scroll of Return and a Christmas Costume Select Box. All items are also linked.
description.de: Ein Paket, das 15 Upcut Stone, 15 Vitaldrink X oder Refresher Hold, 20 Scroll of Return und ein Christmas Costume Select Box enthält. Alle Items sind seelengebunden.

description.fr: Paquet qui contient 15 Pierres Mars, 15 Boissons Énergétiques X ou Fioles de Mana X, 20 Parchemins de Retour en Ville et une Boîte de Tenue de Noël. Tous les objets sont liés.
description.id: Paket berisi 15 Upcut Stone, 15 Vital Drink X atau Refresher Hold, 20 Scroll of Return dan Christmas Costume Select Box. Semua item juga ditautkan.
description.it: A package containing 15 Upcut Stone, 15 Vital Drink X or Refresher Hold, 20 Scroll of Return and a Christmas Costume Select Box. All items are also linked.
description.jp: パワーストーンx15、スタミナドリンクXまたは魔力ドリングゴールドx15、往復の巻物x20とクリスマスコスチュームセレクトボックスが含まれたパッケージ。すべてのアイテムはリンクされています。

description.sp: Un Paquete con 15 Piedra Recortada, 15 Bebida Vital X o Retrasador de Actualización, 20 Pergamino de Retorno y una Caja Seleción Disfraz de Navidad. Los elementos son vinculados.

description.th: แพ็คเกจที่บรรจุ Upcut Stone 15 ชิ้น, Vital Drink X หรือ Refresher Hold 15 ชิ้น, Scroll of Return 20 ชิ้น และกล่องChristmas Costume Select Box1 ชิ้น รายการทั้งหมดจะถูกผูกมัด
description.tw: 一個包含 15 個力量之時、15 個活力多 X 或無限技能飲、20 個回程卷軸和一個聖誕服裝選擇箱的禮包。 所有物品皆為歸屬。
description.vi: Một gói chứa 15 Upcut Stone, 15 Vital Drink X hoặc Refresher Hold, 20 Scroll of Return và Christmas Costume Select Box. Tất cả các món đồ cũng được liên kết.
